analysis.key_quote: This proposed rule imperils the integrity of the civil service by prioritizing the political affiliation of a civil servant over the expertise that civil servants develop over many years in the profession.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the integrity of the civil service, the importance of expertise, and the potential negative impact on recruitment and retention of qualified staff, all of which align with themes opposing politicization and supporting merit-based protections.
